<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/pet/{petId}"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>





<Heading

      >

      >
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"name"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}

        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"status"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}

        >
